title: Siblings Feeding to win
body: SO today I played a game where a group of guys decided to play together.  I am fine with grouping up and playing together I do it all the time. BUT one of their group q got on my team so he started to feed int and ruin the game. He says he just wants his brothers to get ip. Why is there nothing preventing this. I also got reported for pointing this out and now riot thinks im toxic LOL

replies.body: Yeeeaaaa we definitely don't want people simply int feeding in every game to get IP while ruining the entire game for everyone else. Were you able to report them after that match?
I did but I doubt it does anything{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
